title: ‘This Is Attempted Manslaughter’: Van der Poel Angry After a Spectator Throws a Full Water Bottle in His Face
content:
A fan throws a full water bottle at Van der Poel’s face from the roadside during his homestretch to victory of Paris-Roubaix, and he wasn't happy about it.

Read the full article at ‘This Is Attempted Manslaughter’: Van der Poel Angry After a Spectator Throws a Full Water Bottle in His Face on Velo.
author: sstokes
